Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Akho, maim sarana magada ham, lokam de raba di
(Saitana) vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'una vale di bura'i tom, jihara (alaha da nama suna ke) luka janda hai
Jihara lokam de dilam vica vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'unda hai
